# SIS Stub
## Summary

This will set up an API Gateway in front of a lambda to return the stored identity (SI) record for a given user.


## `GET /user-identity`

Gets a user's SI record.
The endpoint does not accept any query/path parameters and does not accept a request body.
It does however require an `Authorization: Bearer ...` header.

### Example Response
```
{
    "vot": "P2",
    "content": "eyJraWQiOiJ0ZXN0LXNpZ25pbmcta2V5IiwidHlwIjoiSldUIiwiYWxnIjoiRVMyNTYifQ..nrbiwaOcvWM92TTAlORzerjjrrCuYD9fcxwEoXbf71J3YZUnwNW0KGUN5jaEvOysG0YWTXSLl_W4sN-Krf7PfQ", // pragma: allowlist secret
    "isValid": true,
    "expired": false
}
```
